polimi.reds.broker.routing
Interface RoutingStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
SubscriptionForwardingRoutingStrategy
public interface RoutingStrategy

In a REDS broker the RoutingStrategy is the module in charge of managing the routing of messages on top of the overlay network (which is realized by the Overlay and maintained, in presence of reconfiguration, by the ConnectionManager. Its methods are called by the overlay (through the router) to perform the basic operations of any event-based dispatching system: process subscriptions and unsubscriptions and forward messages.

Method Detail

subscribe

void subscribe(NodeDescriptor neighbor,
               Filter filter)
Subscribes the specified neighbor to the messages matching the given Filter.

Parameters:
neighbor - the identifier of the neighbor which subscribed.
filter - the Filter used to determine the messages the neighbor is interested in.

unsubscribe

void unsubscribe(NodeDescriptor neighbor,
                 Filter filter)
Unsubscribes the specified neighbor from the messages matching the given Filter. In general, it undoes a corresponding call to the subscribe method.

Parameters:
neighbor - the identifier of the neighbor which wants to be unsubscribed.
filter - the Filter used to determine the messages the neighbor is no more interested in.

unsubscribeAll

void unsubscribeAll(NodeDescriptor neighbor)
Removes all the subscriptions previously issued by the give neighbor.

Parameters:
neighbor - the identifier of the neighbor which requested to be unsubscribed.

publish

FutureInt publish(NodeDescriptor neighbor,
                  Message message)
Publish the given message coming from the specified neighbor. Depending on the routing policy adopted, this requires to forward the given message to some or any of the neighbors of the broker this router is part of.
It returns a FutureInt; it contains the number of neighbors which received the message. This object allows an asynchronous way to set this value.

Parameters:
neighbor - the identifier of the neighbor from which the message was received.
message - the Message to be published.
Returns:
number of neighbors to which the Message is sent.

setRouter

void setRouter(Router router)
Associates this RoutingStrategy with its Router. This method is called by the router constructor.

Parameters:
router - the Router this RoutingStrategy is associated to.
